data.comment: The match has started at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 2, Cerezo attack but Ken Tokura's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 4, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Hiroshima advance rapidly upfield but Ryuji Sato blows for offside.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 5, Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Cerezo's area.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
At Yanmar Stadium Nagai, Hiroshima are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 8, Can Cerezo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Cerezo push forward at Yanmar Stadium Nagai and Hiroshi Kiyotake gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hiroshima defence.
In the minute 11, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 12, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Osaka.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 20, Hiroshima's Tsukasa Morishima gets in a shot on goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Osaka, Tsukasa Morishima of Hiroshima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 21, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ryuji Sato awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Osaka.
Goal! Leandro Pereira gives Hiroshima a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 24, Great play from Shunki Higashi to set up the goal.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Hiroshima drive forward but Leandro Pereira is judged offside.
In the minute 29, Tsukasa Morishima (Hiroshima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 32, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Yusuke Chajima's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima just outside Cerezo's area.
In the minute 36, At Yanmar Stadium Nagai, Riku Matsuda has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 36, Yasuki Kimoto for Cerezo has been booked by Ryuji Sato and receives a first yellow card.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo are whistled for offside.
In the minute 41, Hiroshima drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) has received a yellow card from Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Hiroshima push forward at Yanmar Stadium Nagai and Leandro Pereira gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cerezo defence.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Yuya Asano for Hiroshima is whistled offside.
Yusuke Maruhashi is replacing Riku Matsuda for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 46, Cerezo make their second substitution with Jun Nishikawa replacing Ken Tokura.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Cerezo.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 49, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Free kick Cerezo.
Hiroshima's Sho Sasaki has been booked in Osaka.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Free kick Cerezo.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Cerezo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a third substitution, with Bruno Pereira Mendes replacing Yuta Toyokawa.
The home team replace Ayumu Seko with Hiroaki Okuno.
In the minute 59, Cerezo drives forward and Hiroshi Kiyotake gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Hiroshima will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cerezo.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leandro Pereira in Hiroshima has been yellow-carded a second time by Ryuji Sato and is being sent off.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 66, Douglas Vieira is replacing Yuya Asano for the away team.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 68, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto of Cerezo is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Hiroshima.
Cerezo's Bruno Pereira Mendes attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Cerezo are coming forward and Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
At Yanmar Stadium Nagai, Douglas Vieira has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 75, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Osaka Cerezo attack through Hiroshi Kiyotake. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
In the minute 76, Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's second substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Akira Ibayashi replacing Yusuke Chajima.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Cerezo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 78, Ryuji Sato awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Toshiyuki Takagi is on a sub for Naoyuki Fujita for Cerezo.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 85, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cerezo.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Hiroshima's area.
At Yanmar Stadium Nagai the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ryuji Sato signals a Cerezo throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Hiroshi Kiyotake (Cerezo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Hiroshima defenders.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ryo Nagai is on a sub for Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima.
Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Kosei Shibasaki replacing Toshihiro Aoyama.
